snippet: The family of a woman named Yi-Fen Chou, who attended the same high school in Fort Wayne, Ind., as Michael Derrick Hudson, has stepped forward, demanding that he immediately stop using the pen name.
abstract: The family of a woman named Yi-Fen Chou, who attended the same high school in Fort Wayne, Ind., as Michael Derrick Hudson, has stepped forward, demanding that he immediately stop using the pen name.

headline.main: Family Protests White Poet’s Use of Chinese Pen Name
headline.print_headline: Flap Over Poem Has New Dimension
